messages.content:
{"long_recall_output":[{"content":{"discourse":"W: Jack, what are you doing in the kitchen?
M: I'm looking for some cookies, Mary. I'm feeling a bit hungry.
W: Cookies? But we just had dinner. Why are you still hungry?
M: (8)I had a lot of exercise today. I need some extra energy.
W: Well, you should eat something healthy, not just cookies.
M: Yeah. (8)But cookies are so delicious. I can't resist them.
W: How about having some fruits instead?
M: Hmm, that's a good idea. But I still want to have a couple of cookies first.
W: Oh, you are so naughty. By the way, did you finish your homework?
M: Not yet. I'll do it after having these cookies.
W: You should focus on your studies. Don't always think about eating.
M: I know. But I need to relax a little bit.
","question":"Why does the man want to have cookies?
A. Because he didn't have dinner.
B. Because he had a lot of exercise.
C. Because he likes them very much.
Whose idea is to have some fruits?
A. Jack's.
B. Mary's.
C. Not mentioned.","question_types":"长对话","source":"Custom Generated"},"level":"B"}],"non_recall_output":"","short_recall_output":null}
